project.name: Orion Edge Gateway
project.scope: API gateway, rate limiting, auth integration

sections.title: Project Context & Role Clarity
sections.goal: Understand the interviewee's role, responsibilities, and current state of the Orion Edge Gateway project.
sample_questions: Can you walk me through your primary responsibilities on the Orion Edge Gateway project?
How does the current build phase align with the overall roadmap for this initiative?
What are the main KPIs or success criteria you are tracking at this stage?

sections.title: Requirements & Stakeholder Alignment
sections.goal: Explore how requirements are gathered, prioritized, and aligned with diverse stakeholders, including security and performance teams.
sample_questions: How are you capturing and reconciling input from security, SRE, and client-facing teams?
What process do you follow when two stakeholders have conflicting priorities?
Can you give an example of a requirement that evolved significantly during the build phase?

sections.title: Integration with Other Systems
sections.goal: Investigate dependencies and integration points with other Novereon Systems GmbH projects and subsystems.
sample_questions: Which other internal platforms or services does Orion Edge Gateway integrate with?
How do you coordinate with teams working on IAM or Observability when planning API changes?
Can you describe a situation where integration constraints affected your delivery plan?

sections.title: Risk Management & Mitigation
sections.goal: Understand the risk landscape, mitigation strategies, and how they tie into company policies and SLAs.
sample_questions: What are the top three risks you see for the current release?
How do you ensure compliance with policies like POL-SEC-001 in day-to-day decisions?
Could you share how the SLA-ORI-02 latency target influences your prioritization of features?

sections.title: Decision Making & Tradeoffs
sections.goal: Discuss specific tradeoffs made, the evidence used, and potential long-term implications.
sample_questions: Can you detail a major tradeoff decision you made recently for the Orion Edge Gateway?
What evidence or runbook references did you rely on for that decision?
How do you balance short-term delivery pressures with sustainable velocity?

sections.title: Future Outlook & Lessons Learned
sections.goal: Capture forward-looking insights and retrospective learnings for continuous improvement.
sample_questions: What are the next big milestones after the build phase for Orion Edge Gateway?
If you could change one thing about how the project has been run so far, what would it be?
What lessons from this project could be applied to future gateway or API initiatives?
